label: loadingEvent
comment: The loading event during which goods will be or have been loaded into or onto the means of transport used for this logistics transport movement.

domainIncludes.comment: A piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.,A referenced piece of equipment used to hold, protect or secure cargo for logistics purposes.TBR: description update to excersize GitHub update
The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.
